properties.body:
TURKEY.
ISTANBUL BOGAZI.
DNC 10.
CHART 55048.
1. ISTANBUL BOGAZI CLOSED INTERMITTENTLY 10 DEC
   THRU 10 DEC 15 DURING DAYLIGHT HOURS
   DUE TO BRIDGE CONSTRUCTION.
   VESSELS INTENDING TO ENTER THE AREA
   SHOULD CONTACT TURKISH STRAITS
   VESSEL TRAFFIC SERVICES FOR ADVICE.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 11 DEC 15.
